/** * This is Xerces DOM Builder class. It uses the abstract DOM * parser with a document scanner, a dtd scanner, and a validator, as * well as a grammar pool. * * @author Pavani Mukthipudi, Sun Microsystems Inc. * @author Elena Litani, IBM * @author Rahul Srivastava, Sun Microsystems Inc. * @version $Id: DOMParserImpl.java,v 1.34 2005/06/13 22:26:42 nddelima Exp $ */
